verses.verse: Then the heads<WH7218> of fathers<WH1>' houses of the Levites<WH3881> came near<WH5066> to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and to Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and to the heads<WH7218> of fathers<WH1>' houses of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

They spoke<WH1696> to them at Shiloh<WH7887> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> saying,<WH559> "Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> to<WH3027> give<WH5414> us cities<WH5892> to dwell in,<WH3427> with their suburbs<WH4054> for our livestock.<WH929>"

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> to the Levites<WH3881> out of their inheritance,<WH5159> according to the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh,<WH3068> these cities<WH5892> with their suburbs.<WH4054>

The lot<WH1486> came out<WH3318> for the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites.<WH6956> The children<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> who were of the Levites,<WH3881> had thirteen<WH7969> cities<WH5892> by lot<WH1486> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah,<WH3063> out of the tribe<WH4294> of the Simeonites,<WH8099> and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin.<WH1144>

The rest<WH3498> of the children<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> had ten<WH6235> cities<WH5892> by lot<WH1486> out of the families<WH4940> of the tribe<WH4294> of Ephraim,<WH669> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan,<WH1835> and out of the<WH2677> half-tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh.<WH4519>

The children<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648> had thirteen<WH7969> cities<WH5892> by lot<WH1486> out of the families<WH4940> of the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar,<WH3485> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Asher,<WH836> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali,<WH5321> and out of the<WH2677> half-tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519> in Bashan.<WH1316>

The children<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> according to their families<WH4940> had twelve<WH8147> cities<WH5892> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Reuben,<WH7205> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Gad,<WH1410> and out of the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun.<WH2074>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> gave<WH5414> these cities<WH5892> with their suburbs<WH4054> by lot<WH1486> to the Levites,<WH3881> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>

They gave<WH5414> out of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> and out of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon,<WH8095> these cities<WH5892> which are mentioned<WH7121> by name:<WH8034>

and they were for the children<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> of the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites,<WH6956> who were of the children<WH1121> of Levi;<WH3878> for theirs was the first<WH7223> lot.<WH1486>

They gave<WH5414> them Kiriath<WH7151> Arba,<WH704> named after the father<WH1> of Anak<WH6061> (the same is Hebron<WH2275>), in the hill<WH2022> country of Judah,<WH3063> with its suburbs<WH4054> around it.<WH5439>
But they gave<WH5414> the fields<WH7704> of the city<WH5892> and its villages<WH2691> to Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> for his possession.<WH272>

To the children<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> they gave<WH5414> Hebron<WH2275> with its suburbs,<WH4054> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> Libnah<WH3841> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Jattir<WH3492> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Eshtemoa<WH851> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Holon<WH2473> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Debir<WH1688> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Ain<WH5871> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Juttah<WH3194> with its suburbs,<WH4054> and Beth Shemesh<WH1053> with its suburbs;<WH4054> nine<WH8672> cities<WH5892> out of those two<WH8147> tribes.<WH7626>
Out of the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin,<WH1144> Gibeon<WH1391> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Geba<WH1387> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Anathoth<WH6068> with its suburbs,<WH4054> and Almon<WH5960> with its suburbs;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
All the cities<WH5892> of the children<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> the priests,<WH3548> were thirteen<WH7969> cities<WH5892> with their suburbs.<WH4054>

The families<WH4940> of the children<WH1121> of Kohath,<WH6955> the Levites,<WH3881> even the rest<WH3498> of the children<WH1121> of Kohath,<WH6955> had the cities<WH5892> of their lot<WH1486> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Ephraim.<WH669>

They gave<WH5414> them Shechem<WH7927> with its suburbs<WH4054> in the hill country<WH2022> of Ephraim,<WH669> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> and Gezer<WH1507> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Kibzaim<WH6911> with its suburbs,<WH4054> and Beth Horon<WH1032> with its suburbs;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
Out of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan,<WH1835> Elteke<WH514> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Gibbethon<WH1405> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Aijalon<WH357> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Gath Rimmon<WH1667> with its suburbs;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
Out of the<WH4276> half-tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh,<WH4519> Taanach<WH8590> with its suburbs,<WH4054> and Gath Rimmon<WH1667> with its suburbs;<WH4054> two<WH8147> cities.<WH5892>
All the cities<WH5892> of the families<WH4940> of the rest<WH3498> of the children<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> were ten<WH6235> with their suburbs.<WH4054>

They gave to the children<WH1121> of Gershon,<WH1648> of the families<WH4940> of the Levites,<WH3881> out of the<WH2677> half-tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh<WH4519> Golan<WH1474> in Bashan<WH1316> with its suburbs,<WH4054> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> and Be Eshterah<WH1203> with its suburbs;<WH4054> two<WH8147> cities.<WH5892>
Out of the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar,<WH3485> Kishion<WH7191> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Daberath<WH1705> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Jarmuth<WH3412> with its suburbs,<WH4054> En Gannim<WH5873> with its suburbs;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
Out of the tribe<WH4294> of Asher,<WH836> Mishal<WH4861> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Abdon<WH5658> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Helkath<WH2520> with its suburbs,<WH4054> and Rehob<WH7340> with its suburbs;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>

Out of the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali,<WH5321> Kedesh<WH6943> in Galilee<WH1551> with its suburbs,<WH4054> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> Hammothdor<WH2576> with its suburbs,<WH4054> and Kartan<WH7178> with its suburbs;<WH4054> three<WH7969> cities.<WH5892>
All the cities<WH5892> of the Gershonites<WH1649> according to their families<WH4940> were thirteen<WH7969> cities<WH5892> with their suburbs.<WH4054>

To the families<WH4940> of the children<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> the rest<WH3498> of the Levites,<WH3881> out of the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun,<WH2074> Jokneam<WH3362> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Kartah<WH7177> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Dimnah<WH1829> with its suburbs,<WH4054> and Nahalal<WH5096> with its suburbs;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities.<WH5892>
Out of the tribe of Reuben,<WH7205> Bezer<WH1221> with its suburbs,<WH3096> Jahaz with its suburbs,
Kedemoth<WH6932> with its suburbs,<WH4158> and Mephaath with its suburbs;<WH702> four cities.<WH5892>

Out of the tribe<WH4294> of Gad,<WH1410> Ramoth<WH7433> in Gilead<WH1568> with its suburbs,<WH4054> the city<WH5892> of refuge<WH4733> for the manslayer,<WH7523> and Mahanaim<WH4266> with its suburbs,<WH4054>
Heshbon<WH2809> with its suburbs,<WH4054> Jazer<WH3270> with its suburbs;<WH4054> four<WH702> cities in all.<WH5892>

All these were the cities<WH5892> of the children<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> according to their families,<WH4940> even the rest<WH3498> of the families<WH4940> of the Levites.<WH3881> Their lot<WH1486> was twelve<WH8147> cities.<WH5892>

All the cities<WH5892> of the Levites<WH3881> in the midst<WH272> of the possession<WH272> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were forty<WH705> - eight<WH8083> cities<WH5892> with their suburbs.<WH4054>
Each<WH5892> of these cities<WH5892> included their suburbs<WH4054> around<WH5439> them.<WH5892> It was this way with all these cities.
So Yahweh<WH3068> gave<WH5414> to Israel<WH3478> all the land<WH776> which he swore<WH7650> to give<WH5414> to their fathers.<WH1> They possessed<WH3423> it,<WH3427> and lived in it.

Yahweh<WH3068> gave them rest<WH5117> all around,<WH5439> according to all that he swore<WH7650> to their fathers.<WH1> Not a man<WH376> of all their enemies<WH341> stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> them.<WH3068> Yahweh delivered<WH5414> all their enemies<WH341> into their hand.<WH3027>
Nothing failed<WH5307> of any<WH1697> good<WH2896> thing<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> to the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478> All came to pass.<WH935>
